skill.name: Growth Strategy
skill.description: Modern growth hacking: loops + product-led growth + disciplined experimentation, under privacy and deliverability constraints.
skill.summary: Modern growth hacking: loops + product-led growth + disciplined experimentation, under privacy and d...
skill.author: ClementWalter

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill with no code execution, network calls, or file access. Contains only markdown documentation and growth strategy frameworks.

content.value_statement: Growth teams struggle to align on metrics and run disciplined experiments. This skill provides proven frameworks for growth loops, PLG, and experimentation that drive measurable impact while respecting user privacy.
actual_capabilities: Design growth strategies using loop-based frameworks
Plan and document A/B tests with proper methodology
Optimize activation, retention, and referral flows
Build viral and referral loops that compound
Score experiment prioritization with RICE/ICE methods
Review growth tactics for ethics and compliance
limitations: Does not execute experiments or collect data
Does not integrate with analytics platforms
Does not provide specific platform API access
Does not generate code for tracking implementation

use_cases.title: Plan Quarterly Experiments
use_cases.description: Design experiment roadmap using RICE scoring to prioritize highest-impact tests for onboarding and activation.

use_cases.title: Define North Star Metric
use_cases.description: Establish single metric alignment and input metrics that drive weekly progress for early-stage companies.

use_cases.title: Audit Growth Tactics
use_cases.description: Review current growth initiatives against ethical guidelines and privacy constraints for compliance.

prompt_templates.title: Design Growth Loop
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a growth loop for [product]. Identify the core loop type (viral, UGC/SEO, paid, sales). Map how outputs feed inputs. Propose one concrete improvement to strengthen the loop.

prompt_templates.title: Plan A/B Test
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a test plan for [change]. Define: hypothesis, target segment, success metric, guardrail metrics, sample size rule, and kill criteria. Use the RICE scoring method.

prompt_templates.title: Optimize Onboarding
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze our onboarding flow. Identify top 3 blockers to activation. Suggest specific changes to reduce time-to-value using progressive disclosure principles.

prompt_templates.title: Review Ethics
prompt_templates.prompt: Review our current growth tactic [describe]. Does it strengthen a loop or input metric? Would it survive a public postmortem? Check against: spam, fake reviews, dark patterns, deceptive pricing.

output_examples.input: Help me design a growth loop for our project management tool
output: Loop Mechanism: User creates project â†’ shares with teammates â†’ teammates sign up â†’ create their own projects
Input Metric: Projects per activated user per week
Strengthen by: Make shared projects more valuable as team grows
Test: Add 'invite teammates' at natural workflow point

best_practices: Start with North Star Metric plus input metrics you can move weekly
Define guardrail metrics before shipping any growth initiative
Use holdouts or geo splits when attribution is unreliable
anti_patterns: Optimizing vanity metrics instead of input metrics
Peeking at experiment results before reaching sample size
Launching tactics that cannot survive public scrutiny

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: Works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Each platform can apply growth frameworks during planning and strategy discussions.

faq.question: What are the output limits?
faq.answer: The skill generates structured growth plans and experiment documentation. It does not execute code or access external data sources.

faq.question: How does this integrate with analytics tools?
faq.answer: This skill provides frameworks and templates. You apply the outputs to your analytics platform of choice (Mixpanel, Amplitude, etc.).

faq.question: Is user data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill contains no code that accesses files, networks, or external services. It only provides strategic guidance.

faq.question: Why is my experiment not showing results?
faq.answer: Check sample size adequacy and duration. Avoid peeking early. Ensure proper randomization and guardrail metrics are not breached.

faq.question: How does this compare to growth hacking tools?
faq.answer: This skill provides methodology, not automation. It focuses on disciplined experimentation and ethical growth over quick hacks.
